Constructor & Destructor Documentation

UnixException::UnixException ( const char *  msg = NULL,
  ... 
) throw ()

Add a system message after the error message. The system message is returned by strerror. The last errno value is used to set the system message.

Parameters:
msguser message.
UnixException::UnixException ( int  err = 0,
const char *  msg = NULL,
  ... 
) throw ()

Add a system message after the error message. The system message is returned by strerror.

Parameters:
errerror number (like errno).
msguser message.
